戳.definition: to jab; to poke; to stab; (coll.) to sprain; to blunt; to fuck (vulgar); to stand; to stand (sth) upright; stamp; seal

戳不住.definition: not up to it; cannot stand the test

戳咕.definition: to stir up behind sb's back; to incite secretly

戳壁腳.definition: to criticize behind sb's back; back-biting

戳得住.definition: up to it; can stand the test

戳心灌髓.definition: (idiom) to strike at one's core; to deeply hurt sb

戳破.definition: to puncture; to pierce; (fig.) to destroy (the facade concealing an unpleasant reality)

戳穿.definition: to puncture; to lay bear or expose (lies etc)

戳脊梁.definition: to criticize behind sb's back; back-biting

戳脊梁骨.definition: to criticize behind sb's back; back-biting
